message.body: So Jill told me she is away this weekend too lol so Titan will be free Friday to Sunday if you're interested:)
Ok thank you! I'm planning on a lesson with Tanya Friday am - would it be ok if I lessoned on Titan and jumped a little? I'll hack him over the weekend too.
Awesome, thank you so much! I'm super rusty so it'll be really low key.
Feel free to use my jump saddle, n bridle with the egg butt snaffle bit. N both Jill n I have wolf boots for Titan, so whichever u want to use:) just don't use the bubblegum bit! Haha
Got it, thanks! I rode him in Jill's double jointed snaffle before, keeping it simple :)
